import Rhino
import scriptcontext

def AddBox():
    plane = Rhino.Geometry.Plane.WorldXY
    size = Rhino.Geometry.Interval(-10, 10)
    box = Rhino.Geometry.Box(plane, size, size, size)
    brep = box.ToBrep()
    scriptcontext.doc.Objects.AddBrep(brep)
    scriptcontext.doc.Views.Redraw()
    
AddBox()
